SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ A.ADMIN_PWD FROM MG_ADMIN A WHERE A.ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ADMIN_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.ADMIN_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.ADMIN_ID , A.ADMIN_PNO , A.EMAIL , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_STATUS FROM MG_ADMIN A WHERE A.ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ADMIN_ID = ?
INSERT INTO MG_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MG_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_COUNT FROM MG_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_DISPLAY , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.FILE_TYPE , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_ADMIN B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.ADMIN_NO) LEFT JOIN MG_NOTI_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.NOTICE_NO = C.REF_NOTI_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_DISPLAY = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT /**/ COUNT(*) FROM MG_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_DISPLAY = 'Y'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_DISPLAY , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_DISPLAY , B.NOTICE_GENERAL , B.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM (SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_DISPLAY , A.NOTICE_GENERAL , A.NOTICE_GENERAL_TYPE FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_ADMIN B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.ADMIN_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_DISPLAY = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
